name: MNIST logistic regression
body:
# MNIST handwritten digits classification using Logistic regression 

## Uses Scikit-learn toolbox. 

Total size of training images is  (55000)
Total size of test images is  (10000)


#####Accuracy with training sample size 
![Training sample size Vs Accuracy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/harshkn/MNIST_Logistic_Regression/master/trvsacc.png)

#####Learnt weight vector for training sample size of 55000 
![Training sample size Vs Accuracy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/harshkn/MNIST_Logistic_Regression/master/weights_55000.png)
